page.title: 08CELEBRATIONS AND FESTIVALS
page.content: {Ascension Day. Every year on Ascension Day we go up Pitch Hill. Before we go up Pitch Hill we have a picnic. After lunch we walk up Pitch Hill. When we are on the top of the hill we have an assembly. We sing hymns and say a prayer. Then we play games. After that we go back down the hill. {Harvest. In Autumn our school has a Harvest Festival. We go to church and bring some fruit and vegetables. Sometimes we bring bread and corn. In church we sing songs and hymns. After we have thanked God for Harvest we go back to school. There we sometimes have bread rolls and grapes and blackberry jelly. We have a drink of milk or orange. The mums and dads have coffee.Then they go home and we have lessons.
